title: How AI is undermining learning and teaching in universities
description: Letter: Prof Leo McCann and Prof Simon Sweeney say student misuse of generative artificial intelligence is widespread and we must be sceptical of its usefulness
content: In discussing generative artificial intelligence (‘It’s going to be a life skill’: educators discuss the impact of AI on university education, 13 September) you appear to underestimate the challenges that large language model (LLM) tools such as Chat... [1478 chars]

title: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan joins Jensen Huang and Bill Gates in echoing revolutionary AI prediction that could end the conventional office grind
description: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan has joined Bill Gates and Nvidias Jensen Huang in predicting that artificial intelligence could drastically shorten the workweek. In an interview with The New York Times, Yuan said AIs rapid progress may allow people to achieve more with less effort, paving the way for three-day weeks. While he stresses the need to rethink productivity beyond logged hours, the shift promises both hope for balance and concerns over inequality.
content:

title: US parents to urge Senate to prevent AI chatbot harms to kids
description: Three parents whose children died or were hospitalized after interacting with artificial intelligence chatbots will testify before a U.S. Senate panel on Tuesday, as lawmakers grapple with potential safeguards around the technology.

title: OpenAI announces special ChatGPT for teenagers ahead of Senate hearing on AI chatbot harm
description: OpenAI will roll out a new program to address safety concerns in artificial intelligence forums.
content:
“Teens are growing up with AI, and it’s on us to make sure ChatGPT meets them where they are. The way ChatGPT responds to a 15-year-old should look different than the way it responds to an adult,” OpenAI wrote in the Tuesday announcement.

title: AI could 'im-prove' sourdough starters
description: From sourdough starters at home to loaves in supermarkets—artificial intelligence (AI) could be key to standardizing and upscaling unpredictable sourdough, according to new research.
content:

title: Google details £5 billion UK investment ahead of Trump visit
description: Alphabet Inc.'s Google said it will invest 5 billion pounds ($6.8 billion) over two years in the UK to help build an artificial intelligence economy in the country.
content:
(Bloomberg/Debby Wu and Mark Bergen) — Alphabet Inc.’s Google said it will invest £5 billion ($6.8 billion) over two years in the UK to help build an artificial intelligence economy in the country.

title: Stormont Education Minister dismisses AI speech accusation as ‘cheap shot’
description: Stormont Education Minister Paul Givan has dismissed an accusation that a “large portion” of a speech he delivered in the Assembly was written by artificial intelligence.
content:
The exchange with the leader of the Stormont Opposition Matthew O’Toole came as Mr Givan delivered a proposal for an Executive-led investment programme into special education.

title: Abu Dhabi’s MGX Joins Silver Lake in Deal for Intel’s Altera
description: MGX, an Abu Dhabi-backed investment company focused on artificial intelligence, joined private equity firm Silver Lake Management LLC in a 51% acquisition of Intel Corp.’s Altera, which makes programmable chips.
content:
